name: Stack Attack
description:
Change your color to match the block you want to destroy!

Don't run into a moving block or it's game over!

The difficulty increases as your score gets higher, so watch out!

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Keyboard:

A = Green

S = Blue

D = Yellow

F = Red

Space Bar = Shoot

Arrow Keys to Move

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Xbox controller:

A = Green

X = Blue

Y = Yellow

B = Red

Right Trigger = Shoot

D-Pad to Move

---------------------------------------------------------------------

I made this game as a submission for #LOWREZJAM 2016
